name: @steelskysoftware/facade-toolbox
author: steelskysoftware
description: Collection of various JavaScript helper functions.

scripts.dist: facade build -e ./src/index.js -n toolbox -o dist -m -b -d -f esm -l error
scripts.build: facade build -e ./src/index.js -n toolbox -o dist -w -m -b -d -f esm -l info
